sentences.en: In Norway, after an intervention campaign was introduced nationally, an evaluation of forty-two schools suggested that, over a two-year period, bullying was halved.
sentences.cn: 在挪威，一项干预运动在全国推广后，对42所学校的评估表明，在两年的时间里，欺凌现象减少了一半。

sentences.en: These, added to the detachments of De Givry, and Navarre, swelled Henry's army to forty-two thousand fighting men.
sentences.cn: 这些加到德吉夫里和纳瓦拉支队中，使亨利的军队膨胀到4.2万名战斗人员。
